name: NSURLConnectionDownloadDelegate
desc: A protocol that delegates of a URL connection created with Newsstand Kit implement to receive data associated with a download.

items.name: func connection(NSURLConnection, didWriteData: Int64, totalBytesWritten: Int64, expectedTotalBytes: Int64)
items.desc: Sent to the delegate to deliver progress information for a download of a URL asset to a destination file.

items.name: func connectionDidResumeDownloading(NSURLConnection, totalBytesWritten: Int64, expectedTotalBytes: Int64)
items.desc: Sent to the delegate when an URL connection resumes downloading a URL asset that was earlier suspended.

items.name: func connectionDidFinishDownloading(NSURLConnection, destinationURL: URL)
items.desc: Sent to the delegate when the URL connection has successfully downloaded the URL asset to a destination file.
